name: A Reaper's Job is Tough
description:
You are a Grim Reaper. Help the stray souls and guide them into the after life with your scythe.  A cute and short puzzle-platformer game that made  solo (but with some free assets) for the Game Dev Game Jam May 2022.

Credits Below:

Art

Pixel Adventure by Pixel Frog at : https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1

FREE REAPER MAN CHIBI 2D GAME SPRITES by Craft Pix at : https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-reaper-man-chibi-2d-game-sprites/

Slash Sprite by MetaShinryu at : https://opengameart.org/content/slash-effect-collection

Explosion VFX by XYEzawr at : https://xyezawr.itch.io/free-pixel-effects-pack-4-explosions

Ghost by jcomp at: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/set-cute-funny-happy-ghosts-childish-spooky-...

SFX

Vocal Sample by MirceaKitsune at : https://opengameart.org/content/dialog-vocal-samples

8-Bit Sound Effect Pack (Vol. 001) by Deva at : https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effect-pack-vol-001

Music
